pageContext.claim: “Because Clinton didn't win, Ross Perot took away 19% of the votes. Didn't Clinton get 41% or 43%? So you know, give me a break, but that's OK, whatever. But they had Ross Perot spent like $100 million, which is like probably double if you bring it up to today's dollars.”
pageContext.analysis: Ross Perot spent roughly $60 million on his 1992 presidential bid. That is roughly $111 million in today’s dollars.
